name: alex-ai-optimized-monorepo
description: Alex AI Optimized Monorepo with Turborepo

scripts.dev: pnpm run load-creds && turbo run dev
scripts.build: pnpm run load-creds && turbo run build
scripts.test: pnpm run load-creds && turbo run test
scripts.deploy: pnpm run load-creds && turbo run deploy
scripts.alex-ai:init: pnpm run load-creds && node -e "const { AlexAIManager } = require('./packages/@alex-ai/core/dist/alex-ai-manager.js'); const manager = AlexAIManager.getInstance(); manager.initialize().then(() => console.log('ðŸš€ Alex AI initialized successfully!'));"
scripts.alex-ai:status: node -e "const { AlexAIManager } = require('./packages/@alex-ai/core/dist/alex-ai-manager.js'); const manager = AlexAIManager.getInstance(); manager.getStatus().then(console.log);"
scripts.alex-ai:optimized-init: node -e "const { OptimizedAlexAIManager } = require('./packages/@alex-ai/core/dist/optimized-alex-ai-manager.js'); const manager = OptimizedAlexAIManager.getInstance(); manager.initialize().then(() => console.log('ðŸš€ Optimized Alex AI initialized!'));"
scripts.alex-ai:optimized-status: node -e "const { OptimizedAlexAIManager } = require('./packages/@alex-ai/core/dist/optimized-alex-ai-manager.js'); const manager = OptimizedAlexAIManager.getInstance(); manager.getStatus().then(console.log);"
scripts.alex-ai:test: node -e "const { AlexAIManager } = require('./packages/@alex-ai/core/dist/alex-ai-manager.js'); const manager = AlexAIManager.getInstance(); console.log('Alex AI Manager loaded successfully');"
